divs: Sighting Details i was drivingto phoenix from tucson with mybrothers mothernlaw when i saw a bright light appear in one spot for one minutethen travel from point a to point b then sideways to point c as fast as ashooting star
Summary: we saw a pulsating firey blue ball of light speed
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Casa Grande
